main event: A satellite, identified as Echo II, was observed passing over Provo, Utah on April 13, 1964.
interesting points: The witness requested identification of the observed object.
The observation was recorded on a Project 10073 Record Card from the Project Blue Book archive.
The sighting was determined to be insufficient for evaluation, and the observed object was concluded to be 'Other' than a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object.
The witness sent a handwritten letter reporting seeing an object ascend towards them on the same date.
The report includes a handwritten letter addressed to 'Sir George Building' in Washington D.C.
